import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (
{/* Header Section */}

About Us

Learn more about our mission, story, and what makes us the best in tour management.

{/* Mission Section */}

Our Mission

At TourEase, we strive to make travel planning seamless and enjoyable for everyone. Our mission is to connect travelers with unforgettable experiences while empowering tour operators with modern tools to streamline their operations.

{/* What We Offer Section */}

What We Offer

Comprehensive Management

Effortlessly create, edit, and manage your tours.

Secure Payments

Multiple payment options ensure secure transactions.

Real-time Insights

Track your tours with detailed analytics and reports.

{/* Our Story Section */}

Our Story

Founded in 20XX, TourEase started as a small platform for booking tours. Over the years, we have grown to serve thousands of travelers and operators worldwide, offering a reliable and innovative platform that prioritizes user experience.

{/* Footer Section */}

Thank you for choosing TourEase. Let us be part of your travel adventures!

); }; export default About;
